name: Dragons dream on browser
description:
Few months of learning game development from scratch and Dragons Dream is just my tiny attempt to step into indie game development, so here it is - my very first mini game, it's not big, but put a lot of heart in it :)

I will start to work on bigger projects in the near future.

If you have any suggestions or questions, please let me know in the comment or on facebook page bellow:

https://www.facebook.com/suchagamestudios/
